permissions: User must be an admin or a manager who is a member of the certification type's broker.
side_effects: Updates fields on a certification type.
validation_notes: Requires certification type ID argument. At least one field flag must be provided. Name must be unique per broker. can-apply-to must be one of: Trucker, User, Customer. can-be-requirement-of values must be among: Job, CustomerTender, BrokerTender, JobProductionPlan, Project, Developer, Broker. requires-expiration must be boolean if provided.

flags.name: --can-apply-to
flags.description: New entity type this applies to.
flags.validation: Must be one of: Trucker, User, Customer.

flags.name: --can-be-requirement-of
flags.description: Entity types this can be a requirement of.
flags.validation: Values must be among: Job, CustomerTender, BrokerTender, JobProductionPlan, Project, Developer, Broker.
